weka.classifiers.mllib

Class MLlibSparkContextManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.mllib.MLlibSparkContextManager

  • public class MLlibSparkContextManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for maintaining a singleton Spark context. Stopping a Spark context does not release all resources, so creating, starting and stopping many contexts eventually results in OOM exceptions due to no more native threads being available. Despite the ability to start and stop contexts, it appears that the Spark developers do not expect folks to create more than one per JVM. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-13198
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
